tools.description: OpenSandbox is a general-purpose sandbox platform for AI applications, offering multi-language SDKs, unified sandbox APIs, and Docker/Kubernetes runtimes for scenarios like Coding Agents, GUI Agents, Agent Evaluation, AI Code Execution, and RL Training.

tools.title: anthropics/claude-code

papers.author: Pengzhen Xie, Huizhi Liang

papers.author: Willem Schooltink, Fabio Massimo Zennaro

papers.author: Caroline Ahn, Quan Do, Leah Bakst, Michael P. Pascale, Joseph T. McGuire, Michael E. Hasselmo, Chantal E. Stern
